description: The surprise discovery of the shoot was Andreas Stich (bONKING bERLIN bASTARDS) who shows star quality for the first time. Easy-going and charming, fuck-friendly and with unbelievable staying power, he captivated the team, and, of course, his film partner. Young biker Andreas Stich fucks Rick Speer in an old factory building.Sparks flew right away between Andreas and the sweet little Frenchman Rick.
title: Sex Pigs : Andreas Stich, Rick Speer
